subcommand.function: const now=new Date().getUTCHours()-3;let dayTime;if(now>=20||now<=4){dayTime='Boa noite';}else if(now>=13&&now<=19){dayTime='Boa tarde';}else{dayTime='Bom dia'} return dayTime + (arr ? ' ' + arr.join(', ').split('').reverse().join('').replace(/\s,/, ' e ').split('').reverse().join('') + '.' : '');
